title: TCN Call Center Webinar: Exclusive TCPA/FCC Webinar with Attorney Eric Allen
text:
Informative webinar will educate attendees on the latest TCPA and FCC regulations and how to stay compliant
St. George, UTAH (PRWEB) September 21, 2015
WHAT:
TCN, Inc. , a leading provider of cloud-based call center technology for enterprise, contact centers, BPOs and collection agencies worldwide, will hold an exclusive TCPA/FCC webinar with attorney Eric Allen of Allen, Mitchell & Allen, PLLC to discuss “all things compliant.” The informative webinar will educate attendees on the latest TCPA and FCC regulations, their affects on the call center industry as a whole and what can be done to implement these changes successfully.
WHEN:
Thursday, September 24 at noon, MDT (2 pm, EDT)
WHERE:
To register for the webinar, visit: http://info.tcnp3.com/webinar-tcpa-fcc-with-eric-allen
DETAILS:
Attorney Eric Allen will educate attendees on the latest TCPA and FCC regulations, what the industry is doing, what these changes mean to call centers and how they are being interpreted today, including:
Summary of recent July 10, 2015 FCC Order What this recent order means Tips to navigate the compliance maze Innovative techniques and strategies, including how to obtain “Express Written Consent”
WHO:
Eric Allen, Managing Attorney at Allen, Mitchell & Allen, PLLC – After working in the call center industry for many years, Allen entered private law practice to advise and defend telemarketers, lead generators and dialer vendors. Allen offers cutting edge advice on TCPA, TSR and state regulatory matters, as well as defends marketers in consumer class action lawsuits and government investigations. Allen’s law partners came to the firm to add additional expertise on telemarketer licensing, bonding, litigation and compliance strategy. Allen and his firm help their clients find creative solutions to the new legal hurdles direct marketers face.
Bryce Payne, Vice President of Sales - Payne spearheads all global sales efforts at TCN. With more than 15 years of experience in the telecommunications industry, Payne has significantly contributed to the company's rapid growth by successfully building partnerships across multiple industries and acquiring new customers globally.
About TCN:
TCN is a leading provider of cloud-based call center technology for enterprises, contact centers, BPOs, and collection agencies worldwide. Founded in 1999, TCN combines a deep understanding of the needs of call center users with a highly affordable delivery model, ensuring immediate access to robust call center technology, such as predictive dialer, IVR, call recording, and business analytics required to optimize operations and adhere to TCPA regulations. Its “always-on” cloud-based delivery model provides customers with immediate access to the latest version of the TCN solution, as well as the ability to quickly and easily scale and adjust to evolving business needs. TCN serves various Fortune 500 companies and enterprises in multiple industries including newspaper, collection, education, healthcare, automotive, political, customer service, and marketing. For more information, visit http://www.tcnp3.com or follow on Twitter @tcn.
